title: iMac 820-00291 with sensor issues
message:
Hi guys,

I do not do iMacs (not very often at least) but this one belongs to a really nice customer and want to give it a try.

High fan speed and the photo is from the temp sensors... I checked for missing thermal sensors (like Q5670 etc) but they are all there.. could it be U5650?

Thanks everyone.

title: iMac 820-00291 with sensor issues
message:
Both U5600/50 are placed in the same I2C bus.
So many temperature errors, related with both chips can't be caused by a sensor fail.
Something blocks correct communication on that bus.

Just in case, test disconnecting webcam.

Any history available?

title: iMac 820-00291 with sensor issues
message: Wil try that. The iMac was opened for some upgrade by the customer and this happened upon re-assembling it.
